# replace

**Instance Method**

Replaces an item in the data source array.

## Declaration

```swift
Array replace(
    in int index, 
    in Array items
);
```

## Modifying the Data Source

- **insert**: Inserts a new item into the array.
- **delete**: Deletes an item from the data source array.
- **move**: Moves an item in the data source array.
- **update**: Updates an item in the data source array.

items.description: Inserts a new item into the array.
items.name: insert

items.description: Deletes an item from the data source array.
items.name: delete

items.description: Moves an item in the data source array.
